post_detail.description: We also helped conceptualize, co-direct and execute this teaser for legendary hip-hop artist EL-P's new album "Cancer for the Cure." The spot was directed by Click 3X's Mark Szumski and Timothy Saccenti, of Radical Media. Drone character design and VFX composites for the music video and teaser were done by Szumski with photo-real CGI work handled by our CGI team.
post_detail.title: DRONE Video
